description: An early Francois Zoko goal is enough to give Bradford the win over struggling Crawley, keeping them in the play-off hunt.
title: Bradford City 1-0 Crawley Town
title_page: Bradford City 1-0 Crawley Town - BBC Sport
maintext:
An early Francois Zoko goal was enough to give Bradford City the win over relegation-threatened Crawley Town.
Crawley keeper Lewis Price misjudged a Mark Yeates cross, allowing Zoko to nod the ball into an unguarded net.
The Bantams enjoyed the majority of the possession, but Crawley came close to levelling when Lee Fowler tested keeper Jordan Pickford with a free-kick.
Izale McLeod twice went close for the Reds but Bradford hung on to leave Crawley two points adrift of safety.
